title: Pranks, Parties and Politics: Ron DeSantisâ€™s Year as a Schoolteacher
description: At a private school 20 years ago, the future Florida governor was a popular history teacher and coach. But some students were taken aback by his comments on the Civil War and abortion.
dc:creator: Frances Robles
media:credit: Nicole Craine for The New York Times
media:description: Ron DeSantis taught at Darlington School, a private boarding school in Rome, Ga., in the 2001-02 school year, after graduating from Yale University and just before attending Harvard Law School.
